nodes.text: Wraith Squadron was an Imperial squadron that was wiped out by the Rogue Shadow some time before or during 1 BBY.

Wraith Squadron was first mentioned in the "Rogue Shadow" entry in the in-game databank of the PlayStation 3/Xbox 360 versions of the LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, which was released on October 26, 2010.
